content.raw:
There are some unreleased PRs on ign-math2:

https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branches/compare/ign-math2%0Dignition-math2_2.8.0#pull-requests

What do you think of releasing ignition-math-2.9 as well, @\_jrivero\_? The main changes are frustum checks (important for logical camera) and the addition of the `math::Color` class (which is not used by Gazebo7 yet).
content.html:
There are some unreleased PRs on ign-math2:

https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/branches/compare/ign-math2%0Dignition-math2_2.8.0#pull-requests

What do you think of releasing ignition-math-2.9 as well, @_jrivero_? The main changes are frustum checks (important for logical camera) and the addition of the math::Color class (which is not used by Gazebo7 yet).
